name: RPBroadcastController
desc: An object containing methods for starting and controlling a broadcast.

items.name: var broadcastURL: URL
items.desc: A URL that redirects users to an ongoing or completed broadcast.

items.name: var serviceInfo: [String : NSCoding & NSObjectProtocol]?
items.desc: Information updated by the service during a broadcast.

items.name: var isBroadcasting: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the controller is broadcasting.

items.name: var isPaused: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the broadcast is paused.

items.name: var delegate: RPBroadcastControllerDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate for the broadcast controller.

items.name: protocol RPBroadcastControllerDelegate
items.desc: The protocol you implement to respond to changes in a live broadcast.
